record.id: field.name="db.sort" and file.name="formatctrl" and term=NULL and format.name="formatctrl.maint.dbopts.b" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: db.sort
record.file.name: formatctrl
record.format.name: formatctrl.maint.dbopts.b

brief.brief: Determines whether to use specified the default sort for all queries or only on true queries.
If the condition is true, Service Manager uses the default Sort key from the default.sort Format Control field on all queries.
If the condition is false, Service Manager uses the default sort (if entered) when the query is true and determines the best key for queries other than true.
This sort sequence overrides Service Manager's decision about the most efficient key to use for queries.
Service Manager only uses this field if a default Sort key exists in the Format Control record.
